ygData.subject: RE: Healing and aggro
ygData.msgSnippet: yup.  anything which deals massive help, or massive damage makes aggro :) ... From: Woland Grauensturm [mailto:woland@home.se] Sent: Friday, September 03, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
yup. anything which deals massive help, or massive damage makes aggro :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Woland Grauensturm [mailto:woland@...]
Sent: Friday, September 03, 1999 8:06 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Healing and aggro


From: Woland Grauensturm <woland@...>


If I heal myself, will that aggro mobs the same way as if I heal other
party members?
